name: FPSandbox
description:
FPSandbox is a (first person) (shooter/sandbox) with a fluid parkour system and weapons. This game is also my literal development sandbox, I'm adding whatever I like, whenever I feel like adding it.

Included is a dev console, which currently is the only way to navigate the game other than the menu. Not all commands are functional, as it is a dev console. (documentation coming soon)

Do whatever you want with this game, if you can even call it that.
:3

If your game is running slow, open the dev console(`) and type "semipotatomode". if it's still bad, type "potatomode".
